body.name: Portable Hanging Neck Fan Wearable Personal Handheld Fan Battery Operated USB Rechargeable 3 Speed Mini Handheld Air Cooling Necklace Fan for Women Eyelash Makeup Camping Outdoor (C-black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: - Enjoy Cool Breezes Anywhere: Experience the freedom of hands-free cooling with this portable neck fan. Ideal for work, office, reading, sports, travel, hiking, cycling, and more, it's the perfect companion for staying cool on the go.

- Adjustable Lanyard and Bracket: With an adjustable lanyard, easily hang the neck fan around your neck for a customized fit. The fan also comes with a convenient bracket for placing on a tabletop , adding versatility to your cooling options.
- Wide Angle Air Outlet: Designed with a wide angle air outlet, this neck fan provides a powerful breeze that can reach near and far, ensuring a refreshing cooling experience wherever you are.

- USB Rechargeable with Multiple Speeds: Conveniently recharge the neck fan using a computer, power bank, or any USB-enabled device. With multiple speed options, you can adjust the cooling intensity to suit your preferences and needs.

- Low Noise Design for Comfort: Engineered to produce minimal noise during operation, this wearable neck fan offers a quiet and peaceful cooling experience. Made with premium materials, it ensures durability and superior performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars hanging neck fan
reviews.reviewText: This works great for our bus driver in the summertime. He is always getting in and out and this kept him cool. Its not heavy, and it cools alot more than you would think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice fan for those very hot and humid summer days. Used it several time during summer and it did the job. The reason for 4 stars is that it looks awkward over someone's neck. The price of functionality over looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Great little fan, it has power to it and does not make a lot of noise either. Not heavy at all and you can hang it around your neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Stylish and Convenient Cooling Companion
reviews.reviewText: I recently received the RNKRUN Portable Hanging Neck Fan, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with its design and functionality. This mini fan has become my go-to cooling device, especially during the scorching heat when I need to attend my kids' games.One of the standout features of this neck fan is its thoughtful design. The perfectly placed space on the side allows for the string to go through comfortably, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit around the neck. This feature is not only practical but also adds to the overall modern and stylish appearance of the device.The lightweight construction of the RNKRUN Portable Hanging Neck Fan makes it easy to wear for extended periods without any discomfort. I found it incredibly convenient to carry around, and it has become an essential part of my outdoor activities.The fan offers three adjustable speed settings, which is exactly what I needed for my various activities. Whether I'm just sitting and watching my kids' games or engaging in physical activities myself, I can easily adjust the fan's speed to suit my cooling needs.The only minor suggestion I have for improvement is the addition of a battery indicator. While the fan can be charged conveniently via USB, having a battery indicator would be even more helpful. It would enable me to keep track of the battery level and know when it needs to be charged in advance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it certainly helps. I recommend it.
reviews.reviewText: I live in South Florida where the temperature sometimes reaches about 100 degrees Fahrenheit, which can be extremely hot. This little hanging neck fan has made the situation a bit less uncomfortable for me. I like that it is very slim and weightless, and the blowing aims directly at my neck and chin, somehow reaching my face as well. It makes a difference, as I can cope with the heat for a longer time and stay without sweating. The blowing is fairly good, and the device itself is well-made and looks stylish, with a nice color too. I don't think this is a solution for extremely hot weather, but it certainly helps. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is good for those hot summer days when you still want to get your walking in. It’s also nice to have if you work in a setting where it can get a little bit warm at times. It has quiet operation. It charges quickly and has different settings to meet your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, little fan. I like that you can charge it using a USB-C charger, though I am concerned as the instructions read to not leave it on the charger after it has been fully charged (or else battery could be impacted) because it isn't always possible to monitor that closely. I like that it has a lanyard that you can adjust to determine how closely you want it to your head. It also includes a small stand that is helpful to direct the air. The battery lasts longer than I had expected. I have also used it while putting on makeup as one of the product pictures depicts. I have not tried the aromatherapy element to it yet so can't comment on that. Overall, I recommend this fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works very well
reviews.reviewText: easy to use, great for summers!
